Class RequestController

extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addRequest(io.javalin.http.Context context)
      get json data from api endpoint/context and calls requestservice to add new request
      send success status code when request is added
      static void getAll(io.javalin.http.Context context)
      get json data from api endpoint/context and calls requestservice to get all requests
      send all requests as json
      if user is manager, method returns all requests.
      static void init(io.javalin.http.Context context) 
      static void updateRequest(io.javalin.http.Context context)
      get json data from api endpoint/context and calls requestservice to update an existing request
      send success status code when request is update

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static void init(io.javalin.http.Context context)

      • getAll

        public static void getAll(io.javalin.http.Context context)
                   throws java.io.IOException
        get json data from api endpoint/context and calls requestservice to get all requests
        send all requests as json
        if user is manager, method returns all requests.
        if user is employee, method returns requests made by this employee
        Parameters:
        context - javalin app context and json content from front end, contains user info
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • addRequest

        public static void addRequest(io.javalin.http.Context context)
        get json data from api endpoint/context and calls requestservice to add new request
        send success status code when request is added
        Parameters:
        context - javalin app context and json content from front end, contains new request

      • updateRequest

        public static void updateRequest(io.javalin.http.Context context)
        get json data from api endpoint/context and calls requestservice to update an existing request
        send success status code when request is update
        Parameters:
        context - javalin app context and json content from front end, contains new request info
